SEARCH
Package model.Components

Class AlgorithmComponent

java.lang.Object
model.Components.AlgorithmComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComponentAdd, ComponentAssign, ComponentComment, ComponentDeclaration, ComponentElse, ComponentEnd, ComponentIf, ComponentInput, ComponentOperation, ComponentOutput, ComponentStart, ComponentWhile
public class AlgorithmComponent extends Object
This is the parent class of all the components that can be used in this program

  • Constructor Details

    • AlgorithmComponent

      public AlgorithmComponent(AlgorithmComponent nextComponent1, AlgorithmComponent nextComponent2, MemoryStorage memory)

      The constructor method of the AlgorithmComponent class

      Creates an instance of AlgorithmComponent

      Parameters:
      nextComponent1 - The component that is going to be pointed as next, by default, or if the condition is true (in ComponentWhile and ComponentIf)
      nextComponent2 - The component that is going to be pointed as next if the condition is false (in ComponentWhile and ComponentIf)
      memory - The MemoryStorage instance that is shared in the program and contains all the variables and components

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public Object execute() throws Exceptions

      This method will be called from every instance of any class that extends this class

      This method needs to be overrided by the single child classes for proper functionality

      Throws:
      Exceptions - n/a

    • getNextComponent

      public AlgorithmComponent getNextComponent()

      This method will be called from every instance of any class that extends this class

      This method needs to be overrided by the single child classes for proper functionality

      Returns:
      AlgorithmComponent The next component

    • print

      public String print()

      This method returns the string containing the essential informations that should to be shown in the FlowChartContentPanel

      This method will be called from every instance of any class that extends this class

      This method needs to be overrided by the single child classes for proper functionality

      Returns:
      String

    • printCode

      public ArrayList<Line> printCode(String language)

      This method will be called from every instance of any class that extends this class

      This method needs to be overrided by the single child classes for proper functionality and it will translate the informations contained in the instances to different programming languages such as Python, Java and PseudoCode

      Parameters:
      language - The language that it needs to be translated in

      Possible values:

      • "Python"
      • "Java"
      • "PseudoCode"
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Lines, with all the lines of code generated for the language

    • getNextComponent1

      public AlgorithmComponent getNextComponent1()

      This method returns the first pointed component

      This component is pointed by default, or when a Condition is true

      Returns:
      AlgorithmComponent the pointed component

    • setNextComponent1

      public void setNextComponent1(AlgorithmComponent nextComponent1)

      This method sets the first pointed component

      This component is pointed by default, or when a Condition is true

      Parameters:
      nextComponent1 - The component that has to be set as first component

    • getNextComponent2

      public AlgorithmComponent getNextComponent2()

      This method returns the second pointed component

      This component is pointed when a Condition is true

      AlgorithmComponent the pointed component

    • setNextComponent2

      public void setNextComponent2(AlgorithmComponent nextComponent2)

      This method sets the second pointed component

      This component is pointed when a Condition is false

      Parameters:
      nextComponent2 - The component that has to be set as second component
